sentences.english: The magician riffled through the cards with skilful fingers that moved like lightning.
sentences.chinese: 魔术师用熟练的手指闪电般地洗牌。

sentences.english: You have to shuffle the cards before the cut for deal.
sentences.chinese: 你得先洗牌，然后再倒牌和发牌。

sentences.english: The routing algorithm for alternating group networks and shuffle-exchange permutation networks.
sentences.chinese: 交错群网络与洗牌交换置换网络的路由算法。

sentences.english: False shuffles allow magicians to control the cards when they're in play.
sentences.chinese: 假洗牌让魔术师控制卡时，他们在比赛中是。

sentences.english: Learn about glimpsing a Card in a Shuffle in this free magic lesson video.
sentences.chinese: 在详细了解瞥见在这个自由洗牌魔术课的视频卡。

sentences.english: I wish you' d remember to shuffle before you deal.
sentences.chinese: 我希望在你发牌前记得洗牌。

sentences.english: There have been some big shifts in fortune since the first rumblings of the crisis, five years ago.
sentences.chinese: 自五年前经济危机伊始，全球财富进行了一些大洗牌。

sentences.english: The cha cha dance evolved from the rumba and includes three steps and a shuffle.
sentences.chinese: 恰恰恰舞演变而来的伦巴和包括三个步骤和洗牌。

sentences.english: That player shuffles his or her library afterwards.
sentences.chinese: 在此后，该玩家将他的牌库洗牌。

sentences.english: That player then shuffles his or her library.
sentences.chinese: 在此后，该玩家将他的牌库洗牌。

sentences.english: This could lead to a shake-out within the sector.
sentences.chinese: 这可能会引起业内的重新洗牌。

sentences.english: I'm taking it slow, feeding my flame, shuffling the cards of your game.
sentences.chinese: 我不紧不慢，助长气焰，为你游戏洗牌准备。

sentences.english: As shown in the previous section, generate and shuffle a deck, then create a single hand of five cards.
sentences.chinese: 如上一节所示，生成并洗牌，然后每只手五张牌。

sentences.english: In the reshuffle when first trump back upward, then shuffle.
sentences.chinese: 在洗牌时地要先将牌背朝上，然后再洗牌。

sentences.english: In the reshuffle when first trump back upward, then shuffle.
sentences.chinese: 在洗牌时地要先将牌背朝上，然后再洗牌。

sentences.english: The gruff ruffian's ruffled cuff is scuffed in the scuffle with the shuffler.
sentences.chinese: 在与洗牌者的混战中，粗暴暴徒的皱袖口被磨破。

definition: rushing to stake one's claim in new markets
great heroes pursue deer in the central plains (idiom); fig. many vie for supremacy
to rise abruptly (to a towering position)/to tower over/to spring up/to emerge suddenly/the emergence (e.g. of a power)
to surge like a gathering storm (idiom)/to grow by leaps and bounds
turbulent situation/changing (face, scene, situation, world of etc)
turning point/breaking point/inflexion point (math., a point of a curve at which the curvature changes sign)
air vent/drafty place/wind gap (geology)/tuyere (furnace air nozzle)
tycoon/magnate/big player (including company, country, school etc)/big shot
Vertical and Horizontal Alliance, opposing stratagems devised by the School of Diplomacy 縱橫家|纵横家[Zong4 heng2 jia1] during the Warring States Period (425-221 BC)
